title: Nuisance Ordinance Information Request (Homestead Police Department)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

Any and all records from the past two years (October 2021-October 2023) regarding your nuisance property ordinance that will be referred to as "ordinance"  in this request but could be known (but not limited to) as "Resident Managers" as described in Article VI Sec. 19-105 through Sec. 19-107 in Homestead's city code. 

Please provide any and all written records (including but not limited to hard-copy documents, memos, emails, word processor documents, PDF documents, PowerPoint files, images files, video files etc.) regarding the Ordinance including but not limited to:

• evictions filed by property owners and number of tenants evicted as a result of the ordinance

•  Notice to Vacate's filed by property owners as a result of nuisance abatement 

• Monthly meeting notes including, as per the code: " (i) a list of all current tenants, (ii) a list of tenant evictions, either in process and the status thereof, or completed during the past month which resulted from criminal activity, (iii) an explanation of the resolution or pending resolution of any tenant or management originated police call prompted by criminal activity and (iv) any other information which would tend to decrease and/or eliminate criminal activity in the apartment complexes."

• police calls, reports, citations, or arrests, collected by the municipality police department for the purpose of enforcing the ordinance

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Jenny Wadhwa

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Florida Sunshine Law, I hereby request the following records:

Any and all records from the past two years (October 2021-October 2023) regarding your nuisance property ordinance that will be referred to as "ordinance"  in this request but could be known (but not limited to) as "Chronic Nuisance Property Code" as described in Article VIII Sec. 15-111 through Sec. 15-117.14 in Boynton Beach's city code. 

Please provide any and all written records (including but not limited to hard-copy documents, memos, emails, word processor documents, PDF documents, PowerPoint files, images files, video files etc.) regarding the Ordinance including but not limited to:

• evictions filed by property owners and number of tenants evicted as a result of the ordinance

•  Notice to Vacate's filed by property owners as a result of nuisance abatement 

• suspensions or revocation of a residential rental license, against property owners who fail to comply with the requirements of the ordinance 

• police calls, reports, citations, or arrests, collected by the municipality police department for the purpose of enforcing the ordinance

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days.

Sincerely,

Jenny Wadhwa
